name: Sniper Assassin: City FPS Shot
description:
Sniper Assassin: City FPS Shooter is the best first person shooter action game with sniper aiming to offer you a realistic battle against your enemies.
Features:
• Master Real Sniping Skills with Best Assault Rifles
• Win Battle and Prove Yourself as the Best Survival Hero
• Thrilling Action Packed FPS Game
• Make Crime Free City with Epic Sniping Strategy
• Different Targets to Aim and Shoot
